content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal extraction point at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal extraction entity (position unknown)

### Iron plate crafting setup at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown) for smelting iron plates
- Assembling machine (position unknown) for crafting iron gear wheels

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough resources in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when crafting without the required machines
- Verify that you have the necessary machines (e.g., furnace or assembling machine) available for the recipes you are trying to craft.
